title: 32. Answering Your Burning Questions About Chemical Peels With Michele Phelan + Listener Q+A
description:
Greetings Treatment Roomies! In this episode we are sitting back down with one of your favorite guests, Michele Phelan, founder of Concepts Institute, to talk all things chemical peels, and answer some of our listener questions. Michele has been a licensed and practicing esthetician for 30 years. She owns her own private practice for 20+ years, and is an active educator for Concepts Institute in San Francisco, CA. She's offering all online for the remainder of May 2020!

Find Michele and her courses at www.conceptsinstitute.com

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus + Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
